channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: 4 O'Clock Club
channel.desc: Nero heads to Hollywood to see if he can make his fame and fortune as a singer, dancer, rapper and all-round megastar. However, making it big in the Land of Opportunity is harder than he expected. He ends up living in a basement owned by the Tang Family, being represented by Hollywood?s worst most washed-up agent, and attending a college where he teaches a strand on British History ? a subject he knows nothing about. However, while Nero might not make it big he discovers a different kind of success with the friends and surrogate-family around him. Maybe this American adventure might just work out okay! Meanwhile, Owen and Eli try to make it from the UK to the USA to visit Nero. But a series of mishaps at the airport and on the plane mean their holiday doesn?t go entirely to plan? and they end up stranded in Alaska.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Danny and Mick have to play Romeo and Juliet after a theatre company leaves them in the lurch - this time with Danny playing Romeo and Mick playing Juliet, the role he was born to play.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Pottsfield is hosting a cake decorating masterclass with guest judge Mary Croissant, but after she catches Danny insulting her, she leaves in a grump. It's up to Danny to convince the class he's Mary, teach Lance's judo class and have a performance review with Sharon... all at the same time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Forcing Andy?s mum to take a relaxing day off, the Odd Socks take over her hair salon. However, upon the surprise arrival of some royal customers, will the band be able to cope.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: With Andy?s mum getting injured, Ruby needs a new doubles partner for a tennis tournament. Mac faces his fears to unearth a secret tennis talent and take to the court once again.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Wildlife expert Steve Backshall meets one of the planet's ultimate killers, the saltwater crocodile, as the Deadly 60 team land in Australia's Northern Territories. A rogue croc is terrorising local fisherman, so it is time to lend the park rangers a hand in catching and relocating this prehistoric monster. Steve heads deep into an abandoned mine on a ghost hunt. He is on the search for ghost bats, awesome creatures with huge fangs, that drop on to their prey out of the night sky. Scary stuff, and a first for the Deadly team as these bats have never been filmed in the wild before.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Naturalist Steve Backshall's quest to meet 60 of the deadliest animals on the planet takes him to India. He is on the trail of the saw-scaled viper, said to be the deadliest snake on earth and responsible for 50,000 human deaths each year. It might seem that putting it on the Deadly 60 list is a formality but, in a country famous for enormous snakes, Steve discovers that it has plenty of competition. The sloth bear seems an unlikely candidate for the Deadly 60 until it becomes clear that it has razor sharp claws and an incredibly powerful jaw, attributes that do not go unnoticed by Steve as he gets a little too close to one of them. Steve puts his martial arts skills to good use as he tries praying mantis kung fu in an attempt to get to grips with an insect with one of the fastest strikes around.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: Dr Xand arm wrestles the world?s strongest woman to help find out how muscles grow. And the doctors reveal the Top Five Bizarre Things Your Body Can Do.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: A pirate captain regrets stealing a herd of seasick cows, a Georgian sportsman invents a whole new way of boxing, King Charles II raps about his party lifestyle, and the Georgian army goes to war against a bunch of naughty schoolboys.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Horrible Histories
channel.desc: In Ancient Greece, it's time for Spartan High School Musical, a jester breaks bad news to Henry VIII using armpit raspberries, learn how to stay fit with the Caveman Workout, and Roman emperor Nero stars in a (not very) romantic movie.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Nitro pranks Diamond when the guest on a live TV show can?t stop pumping! The other Gladiators have fun behind the scenes, pranking the audience at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Squawkencluck reboots the now 100 per cent reliable Big Head base computer, which immediately locks up everyone in a maximum security prison.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse's attempts to boost Penfold's confidence backfire when they lead to a ferocious games monster escaping into the real world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Brunel, the crazed time-travelling Victorian gentlechimp, is back and determined to change history so that Danger Mouse and Penfold never meet.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and the gang can?t wait for their all-day PE training day with Grizzly Griller and are baffled when their idol makes them learn a range of boring non-sports that only Walter excels at.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and his mates rebel against an outbreak of unfair fun-killing rules that are being imposed on Beanotown.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis and Gnasher accidentally do good deeds for the people of Beanotown. Intrigued by the new sensation of being thanked and appreciated, they go on a 'helping rampage', leaving a wake of mayhem behind them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert has invented a new contraption to help him fly using an old set of bagpipes. The 'Herbecopter', as Herbert likes to call it, is rather noisy but extremely effective, and Twinkle is unhappy at no longer being the only flying hero. So, when the heroes quest to get Friendlyface?s priceless locket back from a dragon, Twinkle and Herbert become extremely competitive and risk completely failing the quest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Blossom accidentally uses a witch?s broom to make sticks for toasting marshmallows, the owner of the broom casts a spell of squeaky voices on all the heroes. The spell will be lifted once the heroes have returned with new broomstick branches. A simple enough quest, think the heroes, until they realise that a witch?s broom can only be made from the branches of the Really Spooky Tree.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Hoofius has decided not to quest. Not because he would rather be doing a puzzle or playing his panpipes (though that is rather enjoyable), but because this will be his 1,000th quest and will be added to the Scroll of Honour for all to see for eternity. His friends reluctantly quest without him, but when they don?t return, Hoofius soon comes to regret staying behind.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block that holds a frozen prehistoric animal.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a container filled with metal survival food flasks.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings attempt to take back a chocolate egg from a group of penguins.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: Tom and the riders must rescue Plowhorn from Sledkin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dragons: The Nine Realms
channel.desc: Tom and Jun struggle to get ingredients for Gronckle Iron to help stop the World Serpent.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gangnam Project
channel.desc: With Astra suspended, Hannah makes the impossible decision to leave. Can her friends convince her to stay.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A-Troupe buzzes with excitement, ready to perform for the biggest opportunity of their lives. But their excitement is cut short when Summer fails to show up. Piper and Amy's friendship is tested when Piper catches Amy stirring up the past.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: High Hoops
channel.desc: It?s the season finale, and the Vipers could get promoted! However, Aoife is headhunted for county trials - can she do both and make it to the big final against arch-rivals the Comets.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: Tasked with letting go of items that might be holding them back, Lily struggles to shred Matt Furnish?s love letters, and Claire can?t sell her beloved merch.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: When Miss Marmaduke?s love of sushi leads to firing all the teachers, Lily, Claire, Jin and Mr Malone join forces with the kids to get their jobs back.
